text: do they auto happen during something?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1584559270107700> . dont forget me.  would love to hear your and your team’s story of using local dev!
from the boilerplate? `eslint` refers to <https://eslint.org/> and is useful for catching errors in javascript and `prettier` refers to <https://prettier.io/> which is a code formatter.
they are not required for anything
<@U22VBL87M> thanks. I’m looking through everything in the boilerplate as a recommendation so just wanted to check

Hey guys. `hs upload`  and `hs watch`  are not working as intended. Followed the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/developer-reference/local-development-cms-cli|reference> and the command does execute, but not file is written or deleted. Any clues?
Are you sure you have the paths correct
can you paste what command you’re using?

I’m certain I’m doing the correct command since I’m seeing lots of lines executing the code:
```Uploaded file "/Users/marioacarlos/vasaLocal/emailDev/Custom/email/templates/updateGuestTemplate.html" to "Custom/email/templates/updateGuestTemplate.html"```
the command I’m using is `hs upload Custom Custom` The output says that is copying the files but no files are being deleted or no new files are being added.
